title: Colorful air show marks Victory Day
body: Helicopters were also seen flying with the national flag and the flags of the armed forces To mark Victory Day, a special air show is being held at the old Tejgaon Airport area in Dhaka, filling the sky with vibrant colours. The display began around noon on Tuesday, with military aircraft and helicopters performing eye-catching aerial manoeuvres across the sky. Several aircraft participating in the show flew in formation while releasing colourful trails, creating excitement among spectators. Helicopters were also seen flying with the national flag and the flags of the armed forces. Organised to celebrate Victory Day, the air show has created a festive atmosphere in the area.
